content.rendered:
January 20, 2021 – Viceroy’s full response to Tyro’s report is now live.

Tyro’s childish response intentionally omits the extent of the damage, understates the harm to its customers, and flat-out refuse to provide any meaningful data for analysis.

Due to popular request, this report delves into the maths behind our TTV calculations.

Viceroy delve into Tyro’s meaningless and intentionally opaque status update, which omits key figures and context to downplay the significance the bricking.
